notes: Victoria's Secret panties use both alpha (XS-XL) and numeric (2-14) sizing. Measure at the fullest part of your hips for the best fit.
fit_notes: Different panty styles (thong, bikini, brief, boyshort, cheekster) fit differently. Thongs and cheeksters tend to run smaller. For the most comfortable fit, measure your hips at the fullest point.

measurement_guide.how_to_measure:
Hip Measurement: Stand with feet together and measure around the fullest part of your hips and buttocks, keeping the tape parallel to the ground.
Waist Measurement: Measure around your natural waistline, at the narrowest point of your waist.
tips: Hip measurement is the most important for panty sizing
Different styles (thong, bikini, brief) fit differently
Consider sizing up for more coverage styles like boyshorts
